text: Hagi Tairi kumate'ma fore'ma hania zamofo kasnampa naneke ama'ne, Tasisi kumate ventemotma zavi krafa huta zaviteho. Na'ankure Tairi kumamo'ene ventemo'ma enemania kumamo'a havizantfa hu'ne. Hagi ana kuma'ma havizama hu'nea zamofo nanekea hageri amunompi me'nea kuma Saiprusiti eme zamasami'naze.
